message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  How about $105?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think my product is worth a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115.
